```diff
@@ -1,1 +1,146 @@
- 
+ /*!
+  * AI Analysis API endpoints
+  */
+ 
+ use axum::{
+     extract::Path,
+     http::StatusCode,
+     response::IntoResponse,
+     Json,
+ };
+ use serde::{Deserialize, Serialize};
+ 
+ use crate::ai::{CodeAnalyzer, RiskPredictor};
+ 
+ #[derive(Debug, Serialize, Deserialize)]
+ pub struct AnalysisResponse {
+     pub commit_hash: String,
+     pub impact_scope: ImpactScope,
+     pub refactoring_pattern: Option&lt;String&gt;,
+     pub bug_risk_score: f32,
+     pub insights: Vec&lt;String&gt;,
+ }
+ 
+ #[derive(Debug, Serialize, Deserialize)]
+ pub struct ImpactScope {
+     pub files_changed: usize,
+     pub lines_added: usize,
+     pub lines_deleted: usize,
+     pub modules_affected: Vec&lt;String&gt;,
+     pub risk_level: String,
+ }
+ 
+ #[derive(Debug, Deserialize)]
+ pub struct SimilarityRequest {
+     pub commit1: String,
+     pub commit2: String,
+ }
+ 
+ #[derive(Debug, Serialize)]
+ pub struct SimilarityResponse {
+     pub similarity: f32,
+ }
+ 
+ /// Analyze a commit
+ pub async fn analyze_commit(
+     Path(commit_hash): Path&lt;String&gt;,
+ ) -&gt; Result&lt;impl IntoResponse, StatusCode&gt; {
+     // In real implementation, fetch commit diff from git
+     let diff = get_commit_diff(&amp;commit_hash).await
+         .map_err(|_| StatusCode::NOT_FOUND)?;
+ 
+     let mut analyzer = CodeAnalyzer::new();
+     let analysis = analyzer
+         .analyze_commit(&amp;commit_hash, &amp;diff)
+         .await
+         .map_err(|_| StatusCode::INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR)?;
+ 
+     let response = AnalysisResponse {
+         commit_hash: analysis.commit_hash,
+         impact_scope: ImpactScope {
+             files_changed: analysis.impact_scope.files_changed,
+             lines_added: analysis.impact_scope.lines_added,
+             lines_deleted: analysis.impact_scope.lines_deleted,
+             modules_affected: analysis.impact_scope.modules_affected,
+             risk_level: format!(&quot;{:?}&quot;, analysis.impact_scope.risk_level),
+         },
+         refactoring_pattern: analysis.refactoring_pattern.map(|p| format!(&quot;{:?}&quot;, p)),
+         bug_risk_score: analysis.bug_risk_score,
+         insights: analysis.insights,
+     };
+ 
+     Ok(Json(response))
+ }
+ 
+ /// Calculate similarity between two commits
+ pub async fn calculate_similarity(
+     Json(req): Json&lt;SimilarityRequest&gt;,
+ ) -&gt; Result&lt;impl IntoResponse, StatusCode&gt; {
+     let analyzer = CodeAnalyzer::new();
+     let similarity = analyzer
+         .calculate_similarity(&amp;req.commit1, &amp;req.commit2)
+         .await
+         .map_err(|_| StatusCode::INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR)?;
+ 
+     Ok(Json(SimilarityResponse { similarity }))
+ }
+ 
+ /// Predict bug risk for a commit
+ pub async fn predict_risk(
+     Path(commit_hash): Path&lt;String&gt;,
+ ) -&gt; Result&lt;impl IntoResponse, StatusCode&gt; {
+     let diff = get_commit_diff(&amp;commit_hash).await
+         .map_err(|_| StatusCode::NOT_FOUND)?;
+ 
+     let mut analyzer = CodeAnalyzer::new();
+     let analysis = analyzer
+         .analyze_commit(&amp;commit_hash, &amp;diff)
+         .await
+         .map_err(|_| StatusCode::INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR)?;
+ 
+     #[derive(Serialize)]
+     struct RiskResponse {
+         risk_score: f32,
+         risk_level: String,
+         recommendations: Vec&lt;String&gt;,
+     }
+ 
+     Ok(Json(RiskResponse {
+         risk_score: analysis.bug_risk_score,
+         risk_level: format!(&quot;{:?}&quot;, analysis.impact_scope.risk_level),
+         recommendations: analysis.insights,
+     }))
+ }
+ 
+ /// Detect refactoring patterns
+ pub async fn detect_refactoring(
+     Path(commit_hash): Path&lt;String&gt;,
+ ) -&gt; Result&lt;impl IntoResponse, StatusCode&gt; {
+     let diff = get_commit_diff(&amp;commit_hash).await
+         .map_err(|_| StatusCode::NOT_FOUND)?;
+ 
+     let mut analyzer = CodeAnalyzer::new();
+     let analysis = analyzer
+         .analyze_commit(&amp;commit_hash, &amp;diff)
+         .await
+         .map_err(|_| StatusCode::INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR)?;
+ 
+     #[derive(Serialize)]
+     struct RefactoringResponse {
+         pattern: Option&lt;String&gt;,
+         confidence: f32,
+     }
+ 
+     Ok(Json(RefactoringResponse {
+         pattern: analysis.refactoring_pattern.map(|p| format!(&quot;{:?}&quot;, p)),
+         confidence: if analysis.refactoring_pattern.is_some() { 0.85 } else { 0.0 },
+     }))
+ }
+ 
+ // Helper: Get commit diff (placeholder)
+ async fn get_commit_diff(commit_hash: &amp;str) -&gt; anyhow::Result&lt;String&gt; {
+     // In real implementation, use git2 to get diff
+     // For now, return placeholder
+     Ok(format!(&quot;diff --git a/file.rs b/file.rs\n+added line\n-removed line&quot;))
+ }
```
